import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../../../node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css'; const CartProducts = ({ name, price, image, quantity, removeProduct, id }) => { return (
  • {name}
  • ${price.parseFloat().toFixed(2)}
  • { }} type="number" value={quantity} />
  • ${price * quantity}
); } export default CartProducts;
